config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code initializes the SessionLocal object with the database, user, and id. It retrieves the maxQueryTimeout and queryCacheSize settings from the database settings.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered every time a new SessionLocal object is created, which depends on the frequency of creating new sessions in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The maxQueryTimeout configuration affects the maximum time allowed for a query to execute before timing out, potentially impacting query performance. The queryCacheSize configuration affects the size of the query cache, impacting memory usage and query caching efficiency in the system.
